refsect2.title: Using pkg-config
refsect2.para: Like other GNOME libraries, &package_string; uses pkg-config to provide compiler options. The package name is "&package_ver_str;". So in your configure script, you might specify something like:

The "&package_api_version;" in the package name is the "API version" (indicating "the version of the &package_string; API that first appeared in version &package_api_version;") and is essentially just part of the package name.

refsect2.title: Headers
refsect2.para: Including individual headers rather than &package_ver_str;/handy.h is not recommended.
Since the library has not stable API yet HANDY_USE_UNSTABLE_API must be defined for compilation to succeed.
